main_block.title: About Us
main_block.description: You can entrust your project to us, and we will put in every effort to ensure its prosperity. Our goal is not just to complete tasks but to exceed your expectations.

support_block.title: Online Support Chat
support_block.description: Have questions? Reach out to us via chat! 24/7 support available.

services_description_block.title: British Quality
services_description_block.description: Our company is registered in the United Kingdom. We guarantee the quality of our services.

services_description_block.title: Cryptocurrency Payments
services_description_block.description: We are one of the few companies that consistently support cryptocurrency payment.

services_description_block.title: Premium Support
services_description_block.description: You are assisted by highly trained specialists who can understand your needs and see situations from your perspective.

services_description_block.title: Incredibly Low Prices
services_description_block.description: SpaceCore is one of the cost leaders among hosting providers. It's simple and affordable!

interesting_facts_block.title: SpaceCore: Beyond the Horizon
interesting_facts_block.description: Founded in 2018, SpaceCore is committed to providing truly high-quality services at affordable prices. We value the opinion of every client and look towards the future with enthusiasm to make our services as simple and efficient as possible!
